name: Land of the Dead (Horoscope Zine)
description:
Land of the Dead is a 16-page A5 Coloring Book you can print and play with your friends on your next Dark Fantasy, Sword & Sorcery gaming session.

Choose your Undead PC, roll for Weapons, discover your Powers, and try to survive the terrible Lands of the Dead!

The PDF includes a Dungeon, a numbered Hexcrawl map, a Tower side-view illustration, random tables for Encounters by region, and... Doors!

Get to know our games

MSX™ — https://horoscopezine.itch.io/msx-english

Age of Gods — https://horoscopezine.itch.io/age-of-gods

We're independent Game Designers and we love to share what we create with you. Please support our work.

Check our videos and make sure you subscribe into our channel.
